subject: Football (College)
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: A charge against two Penn State officials is likely to be dismissed now that prosecutors have changed the date they claim Jerry Sandusky sexually assaulted a boy in the team’s showers.
snippet: A charge against two Penn State officials is likely to be dismissed now that prosecutors have changed the date they claim Jerry Sandusky sexually assaulted a boy in the team’s showers.
